content:
• To determine the target audience of the movie trailer mobile phone app and their preferred viewing habits to create an effective user experience.

• To analyze the user interface design of similar movie trailer mobile apps and identify the strengths and weaknesses to develop an innovative and user-friendly interface design.

• To investigate the key features that users expect from a movie trailer mobile phone app, such as the ability to filter trailers by genre or release date, and the option to watch trailers in high definition.

• To conduct usability tests to evaluate the ease of navigation, the clarity of the app's instructions, and the overall user satisfaction with the app.

• To assess the impact of the app on the user's movie viewing experience, such as whether the app has increased their interest in a particular movie or encouraged them to visit the movie theater more frequently.
